title: Effect of Mollusca shell extracts on inhibition of kimchi over-acidification

Source: Heliyon, Volume 10, Issue 6

Author(s): Min Jung Lee, Sung Jin Park, Su Jin Oh, Ye-Rang Yun, Yun-Jeong Choi, Eun Hae Kim, Mi-Ai Lee, Sung Gi Min, Ji-Hee Yang, Young Bae Chung, Sung Hee Park
